titleStmt.title: An account of the spirits working upon the minds of men in the several ages of the Christian church in a visitation sermon before the Right Reverend Father in God, Henry Lord Bishop of London, at Burntwood in Essex, Septemb. 14, 1680 / by Richard Hollingworth.
titleStmt.author: Hollingworth, Richard, 1639?-1701.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
